channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Alaska Airlines to Buy 110 Boeing Planes as It Seeks to Expand
item.description: Alaska’s order, its largest ever, follows its acquisition of Hawaiian Airlines and is part of its plan to expand, including overseas.

item.title: U.S. to Control Venezuela Oil Sales ‘Indefinitely,’ Energy Secretary Says
item.description: Chris Wright said the Trump administration was in “active dialogue” with Venezuela’s government about the plan.

item.title: Greetings from a Paris park, where a lone sequoia tree is a marvel to behold
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: A walking challenge to start 2026 on your feet — and off your screens
item.description: The solution to too much sitting is simple but hard to stick with. This walking challenge sets you up for success, with six tips to keep you moving th...

item.title: Buy Greenland? Take It? Why? An Old Pact Already Gives Trump a Free Hand.
item.description: Analysts say the Cold War agreement allows the president to increase the American military presence almost at will.

item.title: U.S. seizes Russian-flagged oil tanker with ties to Venezuela
